concept.title: How to format the date and time
concept.shortdesc: Format the date with locale-dependent settings, including the date separator characters, and format date as European, American or Japanese

conbody.p: Use TTime::FormatL() to format the locale-dependent aspects of the time, including the time separator characters, whether a 12 or 24 hour clock is to be used, and whether am/pm text should be located before or after the time.
